name: Aethertow
oracle_text:
Put target attacking or blocking creature on top of its owner's library.
Conspire (As you cast this spell, you may tap two untapped creatures you control that share a color with it. When you do, copy it and you may choose a new target for the copy.)

name: Aphotic Wisps
oracle_text:
Target creature becomes black and gains fear until end of turn. (It can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or black creatures.)
Draw a card.
flavor_text: Merrows skulk the silty bogs around the Wanderbrine, their very thoughts stained with evil.

name: Apothecary Initiate
oracle_text: Whenever a player casts a white spell, you may pay {1}. If you do, you gain 1 life.
flavor_text: Kithkin jealously hoard their knowledge of poultices and remedies so that no outside threat can benefit from their wisdom.

name: Ashenmoor Cohort
oracle_text: Ashenmoor Cohort gets +1/+1 as long as you control another black creature.
flavor_text:
"None will concede a place for us in this world. If it is not for us, neither shall it be for them. We rest not until they choke in its cold ashes."
—Illulia of Nighthearth

name: Ballynock Cohort
oracle_text:
First strike
Ballynock Cohort gets +1/+1 as long as you control another white creature.
flavor_text: A kithkin's worst enemy is solitude.

name: Barkshell Blessing
oracle_text:
Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn.
Conspire (As you cast this spell, you may tap two untapped creatures you control that share a color with it. When you do, copy it and you may choose a new target for the copy.)

name: Barrenton Cragtreads
oracle_text: Barrenton Cragtreads can't be blocked by red creatures.
flavor_text: "Boggarts are easy to get around. Just toss some mutton in another direction. Giants are a little harder. You have to be quick to avoid their steps. Cinders are the difficult ones, but even they have fears to be exploited."

name: Barrenton Medic
oracle_text:
{T}: Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to any target this turn.
Put a -1/-1 counter on Barrenton Medic: Untap Barrenton Medic.
flavor_text: His dreams are filled with noxious powders and clinking vials.

name: Blazethorn Scarecrow
oracle_text:
Blazethorn Scarecrow has haste as long as you control a red creature.
Blazethorn Scarecrow has wither as long as you control a green creature. (It deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters.)

name: Blight Sickle
oracle_text:
Equipped creature gets +1/+0 and has wither. (It deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters.)
Equip {2}
flavor_text: Its scars cut deeper than its blade.

name: Blistering Dieflyn
oracle_text:
Flying
{B/R}: Blistering Dieflyn gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
flavor_text: Any kithkin smith would love to catch a dieflyn for her kiln, relieving her of ever having to gather fuel again.

name: Bloodshed Fever
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature attacks each combat if able.
flavor_text: Cinder mages enjoy seeing their victims in the throes of bloodlust—and seeing the regret that inevitably follows.

name: Boggart Arsonists
oracle_text:
Plainswalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Plains.)
{2}{R}, Sacrifice Boggart Arsonists: Destroy target Scarecrow or Plains.
flavor_text: The Aurora transformed Nibb and Gyik from mischief-makers into feral marauders. They still don't know much about tool safety.

name: Briarberry Cohort
oracle_text:
Flying
Briarberry Cohort gets +1/+1 as long as you control another blue creature.
flavor_text: A clique can cause far more mischief than one faerie on its own.

name: Burn Trail
oracle_text:
Burn Trail deals 3 damage to any target.
Conspire (As you cast this spell, you may tap two untapped creatures you control that share a color with it. When you do, copy it and you may choose a new target for the copy.)

name: Cerulean Wisps
oracle_text:
Target creature becomes blue until end of turn. Untap that creature.
Draw a card.
flavor_text:
"If you see ghostly lights by the river, eat three twigs of marshroot to ward off kelpies."
—Kithkin superstition

name: Chainbreaker
oracle_text:
Chainbreaker enters the battlefield with two -1/-1 counters on it.
{3}, {T}: Remove a -1/-1 counter from target creature.
flavor_text: Scarecrows deemed too malevolent to roam free are shackled to boulders or dolmen stones. Their animosity usually outlives the chains.

name: Cinderbones
oracle_text:
Wither (This deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters.)
{1}{B}: Regenerate Cinderbones.
flavor_text: Not all coals lie quietly in their beds of cold ash.

name: Cinderhaze Wretch
oracle_text:
{T}: Target player discards a card. Activate only during your turn.
Put a -1/-1 counter on Cinderhaze Wretch: Untap Cinderhaze Wretch.
flavor_text: Thick smoke billows and twists to form disturbing faces that cackle and click their teeth to the popping embers.

name: Consign to Dream
oracle_text: Return target permanent to its owner's hand. If that permanent is red or green, put it on top of its owner's library instead.
flavor_text:
"Dreams are fleeting. Reality even more so."
—Oona, queen of the fae

name: Crabapple Cohort
oracle_text: Crabapple Cohort gets +1/+1 as long as you control another green creature.
flavor_text: Seven wives made seven pies from seven apples, each plucked from its branches. Now bare and bitter, it comes to exact its price: one apple, one bone.

name: Crimson Wisps
oracle_text:
Target creature becomes red and gains haste until end of turn.
Draw a card.
flavor_text: The whispers are incomprehensible, yet cinders always hear a message of urgency.

name: Cultbrand Cinder
oracle_text: When Cultbrand Cinder enters the battlefield, put a -1/-1 counter on target creature.
flavor_text: "Your seared flesh will be the first step in your journey to dark enlightenment."

name: Curse of Chains
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
At the beginning of each upkeep, tap enchanted creature.
flavor_text: The giant's real punishment was the fleeting moment when he was allowed to stand before being dragged down to his knees again.

name: Devoted Druid
oracle_text:
{T}: Add {G}.
Put a -1/-1 counter on Devoted Druid: Untap Devoted Druid.
flavor_text: "Mana lurks in all things, even in the depths of one's own heart."

name: Disturbing Plot
oracle_text:
Return target creature card from a graveyard to its owner's hand.
Conspire (As you cast this spell, you may tap two untapped creatures you control that share a color with it. When you do, copy it and you may choose a new target for the copy.)

name: Drowner Initiate
oracle_text: Whenever a player casts a blue spell, you may pay {1}. If you do, target player mills two cards.
flavor_text: Nothing satisfies a merrow as much as drowning what it cannot have.

name: Elsewhere Flask
oracle_text:
When Elsewhere Flask enters the battlefield, draw a card.
Sacrifice Elsewhere Flask: Choose a basic land type. Each land you control becomes that type until end of turn.
flavor_text: One night Oona bottled the sky. The next night she aligned the stars and released it.

name: Elvish Hexhunter
oracle_text: {G/W}, {T}, Sacrifice Elvish Hexhunter: Destroy target enchantment.
flavor_text: "All manner of curses, blights, and luckspoils infect Shadowmoor. We stalk them all, one perilous quest at a time."

name: Ember Gale
oracle_text: Creatures target player controls can't block this turn. Ember Gale deals 1 damage to each white and/or blue creature that player controls.
flavor_text:
"Terrible wind. It whipped sparks into our skin, then stoked them even hotter!"
—Bowen, Barrenton guardcaptain

name: Emberstrike Duo
oracle_text:
Whenever you cast a black spell, Emberstrike Duo gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
Whenever you cast a red spell, Emberstrike Duo gains first strike until end of turn.

name: Faerie Macabre
oracle_text:
Flying
Discard Faerie Macabre: Exile up to two target cards from graveyards.
flavor_text: The line between dream and death is gauzy and fragile. She leads those too near it from one side to the other.

name: Farhaven Elf
oracle_text: When Farhaven Elf enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.
flavor_text: "Verdant bloom does exist. It merely hides for its own safety."

name: Fate Transfer
oracle_text: Move all counters from target creature onto another target creature.
flavor_text:
"The cinders find strength in suffering, the elves in beauty. But if you make an elf suffer, he gets weaker. I wonder what happens if you make a cinder beautiful?"
—Hrugash, leech bonder

name: Fists of the Demigod
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
As long as enchanted creature is black, it gets +1/+1 and has wither. (It deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters.)
As long as enchanted creature is red, it gets +1/+1 and has first strike.

name: Foxfire Oak
oracle_text: {R/G}{R/G}{R/G}: Foxfire Oak gets +3/+0 until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"The brethren shall blaze with unnatural fire, and the flame shall consume and purify our rage."
—Treefolk catastrophe myth

name: Ghastly Discovery
oracle_text:
Draw two cards, then discard a card.
Conspire (As you cast this spell, you may tap two untapped creatures you control that share a color with it. When you do, copy it.)
flavor_text: Korrigans, spirits bound to sources of water, shriek when they come upon their own drowned corpses.

name: Giantbaiting
oracle_text:
Create a 4/4 red and green Giant Warrior creature token with haste. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step.
Conspire (As you cast this spell, you may tap two untapped creatures you control that share a color with it. When you do, copy it.)

name: Gleeful Sabotage
oracle_text:
Destroy target artifact or enchantment.
Conspire (As you cast this spell, you may tap two untapped creatures you control that share a color with it. When you do, copy it and you may choose a new target for the copy.)

name: Gloomlance
oracle_text: Destroy target creature. If that creature was green or white, its controller discards a card.
flavor_text: Death stings the victim only once, but those left behind feel the pain of loss with every passing memory.

name: Gloomwidow's Feast
oracle_text: Destroy target creature with flying. If that creature was blue or black, create a 1/2 green Spider creature token with reach. (It can block creatures with flying.)
flavor_text: Each night, gloomwidows cull fresh prey for their ravenous hatchlings.

name: Goldenglow Moth
oracle_text:
Flying
Whenever Goldenglow Moth blocks, you may gain 4 life.
flavor_text: Ordinary moths follow it, drawn to its light.

name: Gravelgill Axeshark
oracle_text: Persist (When this creature dies, if it had no -1/-1 counters on it, return it to the battlefield under its owner's control with a -1/-1 counter on it.)
flavor_text:
"Their sharp scales would make good armor, if they'd just stay dead."
—Taeryn, cinder armorkeep

name: Gravelgill Duo
oracle_text:
Whenever you cast a blue spell, Gravelgill Duo gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
Whenever you cast a black spell, Gravelgill Duo gains fear until end of turn. (It can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or black creatures.)

name: Helm of the Ghastlord
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
As long as enchanted creature is blue, it gets +1/+1 and has "Whenever this creature deals damage to an opponent, draw a card."
As long as enchanted creature is black, it gets +1/+1 and has "Whenever this creature deals damage to an opponent, that player discards a card."

name: Hungry Spriggan
oracle_text:
Trample
Whenever Hungry Spriggan attacks, it gets +3/+3 until end of turn.
flavor_text: If a spriggan's eyes are larger than its stomach, it has ways to remedy the situation.

name: Inescapable Brute
oracle_text:
Wither (This deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters.)
Inescapable Brute must be blocked if able.
flavor_text: If you think you made it past him alive, he's just teasing you.

name: Inquisitor's Snare
oracle_text: Prevent all damage target attacking or blocking creature would deal this turn. If that creature is black or red, destroy it.
flavor_text: Driven by their paranoia, kithkin inflict on their foes all the agonies they believe would have been inflicted on them.

name: Intimidator Initiate
oracle_text: Whenever a player casts a red spell, you may pay {1}. If you do, target creature can't block this turn.
flavor_text: Don't stand in his way, for his way is full of pointy things and fire.

name: Juvenile Gloomwidow
oracle_text:
Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)
Wither (This deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters.)
flavor_text: Gloomwidow venom is particularly virulent during the spider's first years, when it does most of its hunting near the forest floor.

name: Kinscaer Harpoonist
oracle_text:
Flying
Whenever Kinscaer Harpoonist attacks, you may have target creature lose flying until end of turn.
flavor_text: The suspicious kithkin of Kinscaer patrol the skies, their eyes attuned to the shapes of outsiders.

name: Kithkin Shielddare
oracle_text: {W}, {T}: Target blocking creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn.
flavor_text: The nova glyph is a potent symbol. A shield embossed with it can resist the force of even the most determined giant.

name: Last Breath
oracle_text: Exile target creature with power 2 or less. Its controller gains 4 life.
flavor_text:
"Tsk. You'd think those nasty merrows would know how to hold their breath."
—Olka, mistmeadow witch

name: Loamdragger Giant
flavor_text: Giants sleep soundly and long, sometimes for long enough that a crust of earth and moss grows over them. But inevitably something disturbs their slumber, and they wake unhappy.

name: Loch Korrigan
oracle_text: {U/B}: Loch Korrigan gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"Don't look upon still waters without first breaking the surface. The korrigan will catch you with her gaze and drag you to your death."
—Kithkin superstition

name: Manaforge Cinder
oracle_text: {1}: Add {B} or {R}. Activate no more than three times each turn.
flavor_text: Cinder mystics set traps for sluaghs and other spirits of flame, seeking to extract the secrets of the fire their own hearts have lost.

name: Manamorphose
oracle_text:
Add two mana in any combination of colors.
Draw a card.
flavor_text: For a moment, objects of pure mana glimmered in the wonderstruck boggart's hands. In the next moment, they were in his mouth, as he chewed contentedly.

name: Medicine Runner
oracle_text: When Medicine Runner enters the battlefield, you may remove a counter from target permanent.
flavor_text: Elvish healers carry vials of the balm known as dawnglow, reserving it for those wounds that herbs cannot treat.

name: Memory Sluice
oracle_text:
Target player mills four cards.
Conspire (As you cast this spell, you may tap two untapped creatures you control that share a color with it. When you do, copy it and you may choose a new target for the copy.)

name: Merrow Wavebreakers
oracle_text: {1}{U}, {Q}: Merrow Wavebreakers gains flying until end of turn. ({Q} is the untap symbol.)
flavor_text: The merrows' prey have retreated from the shore, so they have learned to follow.

name: Mine Excavation
oracle_text:
Return target artifact or enchantment card from a graveyard to its owner's hand.
Conspire (As you cast this spell, you may tap two untapped creatures you control that share a color with it. When you do, copy it and you may choose a new target for the copy.)

name: Morselhoarder
oracle_text:
Morselhoarder enters the battlefield with two -1/-1 counters on it.
Remove a -1/-1 counter from Morselhoarder: Add one mana of any color.
flavor_text: It scours the hills for living matter, savoring even the tang of poisonous fungi.

name: Mudbrawler Cohort
oracle_text:
Haste
Mudbrawler Cohort gets +1/+1 as long as you control another red creature.
flavor_text: Before a raid, the members of Wort's gang egg each other on with tales of their hunger and what they'll do to sate it, each outdoing the last.

name: Mudbrawler Raiders
oracle_text: Mudbrawler Raiders can't be blocked by blue creatures.
flavor_text: To reach the ravine of the Wanderbrine River, they were told to take the shortcut "through the mountains." They took the directions literally.

name: Niveous Wisps
oracle_text:
Target creature becomes white until end of turn. Tap that creature.
Draw a card.
flavor_text: In a world devoid of sun, illumination comes from cheerless fires or the wandering spirits of the dead.

name: Nurturer Initiate
oracle_text: Whenever a player casts a green spell, you may pay {1}. If you do, target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
flavor_text: The elves alone preserve the few shreds of beauty left. There is no one else who cares.

name: Old Ghastbark
flavor_text:
"Beware of trees that talk. Their words are threats. And mind the ones that sway and creak. They too threaten us, but in a foreign tongue."
—*The Book of Other Folk*

name: Oona's Gatewarden
oracle_text:
Defender, flying
Wither (This deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters.)
flavor_text: "So now you've seen Glen Elendra. Take a good look. It will be the last thing you'll ever see."

name: Parapet Watchers
oracle_text: {W/U}: Parapet Watchers gets +0/+1 until end of turn.
flavor_text: A kithkin doun is not so much a town as a fortress, built to withstand the constantly besieging darkness. Only those most watchful and trustworthy are tasked with guarding its walls.

name: Pili-Pala
oracle_text:
Flying
{2}, {Q}: Add one mana of any color. ({Q} is the untap symbol.)
flavor_text: It wasn't really expected to fly. Then again, it wasn't expected to move, either.

name: Poison the Well
oracle_text: Destroy target land. Poison the Well deals 2 damage to that land's controller.
flavor_text: Wells that provide clean, unhaunted water are rare enough to be worth building an entire town around.

name: Power of Fire
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature has "{T}: This creature deals 1 damage to any target."
flavor_text: The cinders believe their flame was stolen by one they call the Extinguisher. All who now wield fire draw their desperate wrath.

name: Presence of Gond
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature has "{T}: Create a 1/1 green Elf Warrior creature token."
flavor_text: "Here lies Gond, hero of Safehold Taldwen. May he ever guide our quest."

name: Prismwake Merrow
oracle_text:
Flash
When Prismwake Merrow enters the battlefield, target permanent becomes the color or colors of your choice until end of turn.
flavor_text: "Seeing is believing" is a fact the merrows ruthlessly exploit in their dealings with the other residents of Shadowmoor.

name: Puncture Bolt
oracle_text: Puncture Bolt deals 1 damage to target creature. Put a -1/-1 counter on that creature.
flavor_text: Cinder pyromancers measure their success by counting their enemies' smoking holes.

name: Put Away
oracle_text: Counter target spell. You may shuffle up to one target card from your graveyard into your library.
flavor_text: Kithkin spellbottlers spend half their time preserving old memories and the other half punishing the new.

name: Rattleblaze Scarecrow
oracle_text:
Rattleblaze Scarecrow has persist as long as you control a black creature. (When this creature dies, if it had no -1/-1 counters on it, return it to the battlefield under its owner's control with a -1/-1 counter on it.)
Rattleblaze Scarecrow has haste as long as you control a red creature.

name: Raven's Run Dragoon
oracle_text: Raven's Run Dragoon can't be blocked by black creatures.
flavor_text: "I have a gift. The ability to sense encroaching darkness has saved many lives. And yet constantly feeling the force of so much ugliness is a terrible burden."

name: Rite of Consumption
oracle_text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature.
Rite of Consumption deals damage equal to the sacrificed creature's power to target player or planeswalker. You gain life equal to the damage dealt this way.

name: Rune-Cervin Rider
oracle_text:
Flying
{G/W}{G/W}: Rune-Cervin Rider gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
flavor_text: Things of beauty are in constant peril. The riders whisk them to safety, ahead of the encroaching darkness.

name: Runes of the Deus
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
As long as enchanted creature is red, it gets +1/+1 and has double strike. (It deals both first-strike and regular combat damage.)
As long as enchanted creature is green, it gets +1/+1 and has trample.

name: Rustrazor Butcher
oracle_text:
First strike
Wither (This deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters.)
flavor_text: A Bloodwort's blade is salted with blood and peppered with rust, seasoning and slaughtering in a single swipe.

name: Safehold Duo
oracle_text:
Whenever you cast a green spell, Safehold Duo gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
Whenever you cast a white spell, Safehold Duo gains vigilance until end of turn.

name: Safehold Elite
oracle_text: Persist (When this creature dies, if it had no -1/-1 counters on it, return it to the battlefield under its owner's control with a -1/-1 counter on it.)
flavor_text: "I refuse to die—not at the hands of one such as you."

name: Safehold Sentry
oracle_text: {2}{W}, {Q}: Safehold Sentry gets +0/+2 until end of turn. ({Q} is the untap symbol.)
flavor_text: "These bracers were worn by my father and by his mother before him. Boggart fangs have shattered on them. Cinder flames have withered at their touch. While I wear them, the safehold will not fall."

name: Safewright Quest
oracle_text: Search your library for a Forest or Plains card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.
flavor_text: Elves search for sources of beauty in a nighted world. Meanwhile, the nighted world searches for the blood of elves.

name: Scar
oracle_text: Put a -1/-1 counter on target creature.
flavor_text:
"What is a scar? A sign of courage in the face of danger? A mere trick of flesh? Or a constant reminder of agonizing pain, and the follies of war."
—Illulia of Nighthearth

name: Scarscale Ritual
oracle_text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, put a -1/-1 counter on a creature you control.
Draw two cards.
flavor_text: Some words are too important to trust to something as fragile as memory.

name: Scrapbasket
oracle_text: {1}: Scrapbasket becomes all colors until end of turn.
flavor_text: Once a tool of kithkin farmers, scarecrows of all shapes now skitter and lurch across Shadowmoor, animated by residual rustic magics.

name: Scuttlemutt
oracle_text:
{T}: Add one mana of any color.
{T}: Target creature becomes the color or colors of your choice until end of turn.
flavor_text: Built to shuttle goods from the river, it took off one day carrying a cauldron of dyes.

name: Scuzzback Marauders
oracle_text:
Trample
Persist (When this creature dies, if it had no -1/-1 counters on it, return it to the battlefield under its owner's control with a -1/-1 counter on it.)

name: Scuzzback Scrapper
oracle_text: Wither (This deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters.)
flavor_text: The Scuzzback gang scavenges rusty armor covered in barbed protrusions. No threat is more effective than the threat of infection.

name: Shield of the Oversoul
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
As long as enchanted creature is green, it gets +1/+1 and has indestructible. (Damage and effects that say "destroy" don't destroy it. If its toughness is 0 or less, it's still put into its owner's graveyard.)
As long as enchanted creature is white, it gets +1/+1 and has flying.

name: Sickle Ripper
oracle_text: Wither (This deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters.)
flavor_text: His sickle was forged in the heat of another cinder's funeral pyre.

name: Silkbind Faerie
oracle_text:
Flying
{1}{W/U}, {Q}: Tap target creature. ({Q} is the untap symbol.)
flavor_text: "The bigger they are, the more fun it is to watch them fall flat on their faces."

name: Sinking Feeling
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature doesn't untap during its controller's untap step.
Enchanted creature has "{1}, Put a -1/-1 counter on this creature: Untap this creature."

name: Smash to Smithereens
oracle_text: Destroy target artifact. Smash to Smithereens deals 3 damage to that artifact's controller.
flavor_text: The giant Tarvik dreamed that trinkets and machines caused all the world's woe. When he awoke from his troubled sleep, he took the name Tarvik Relicsmasher.

name: Smolder Initiate
oracle_text: Whenever a player casts a black spell, you may pay {1}. If you do, target player loses 1 life.
flavor_text: "Life is a circle. Death is a vicious circle."

name: Somnomancer
oracle_text: When Somnomancer enters the battlefield, you may tap target creature.
flavor_text: "Are you tired? You look tired."

name: Sootstoke Kindler
oracle_text:
Haste
{T}: Target black or red creature gains haste until end of turn.
flavor_text: "Nothing warms my heart better than a spirit kindled with rage."

name: Sootwalkers
oracle_text: Sootwalkers can't be blocked by white creatures.
flavor_text: "Why allow the fires of others to burn, when ours do not? Why leave them content, while we suffer? If there is to be misery, let it be borne by all."

name: Spell Syphon
oracle_text: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {1} for each blue permanent you control.
flavor_text: Warrik Brutehexer felt betrayed that his aura favored the depths of the Wanderbrine River over its rightful place, hovering around him.

name: Splitting Headache
oracle_text:
Choose one —
• Target player discards two cards.
• Target player reveals their hand. You choose a card from it. That player discards that card.
flavor_text: All faeries delve for dreams. But not all wait for their victims to fall asleep.

name: Steel of the Godhead
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
As long as enchanted creature is white, it gets +1/+1 and has lifelink. (Damage dealt by the creature also causes its controller to gain that much life.)
As long as enchanted creature is blue, it gets +1/+1 and can't be blocked.

name: Strip Bare
oracle_text: Destroy all Auras and Equipment attached to target creature.
flavor_text:
"All glamers lifted, all lies revealed, all flesh exposed."
—Awylla, elvish safewright

name: Tattermunge Duo
oracle_text:
Whenever you cast a red spell, Tattermunge Duo gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
Whenever you cast a green spell, Tattermunge Duo gains forestwalk until end of turn. (It can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Forest.)

name: Thistledown Duo
oracle_text:
Whenever you cast a white spell, Thistledown Duo gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
Whenever you cast a blue spell, Thistledown Duo gains flying until end of turn.

name: Thornwatch Scarecrow
oracle_text:
Thornwatch Scarecrow has wither as long as you control a green creature. (It deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters.)
Thornwatch Scarecrow has vigilance as long as you control a white creature.

name: Toil to Renown
oracle_text: You gain 1 life for each tapped artifact, creature, and land you control.
flavor_text: The last survivor of her patrol, the warrior returned expecting disappointment and scorn. Instead she found gratitude. "You are alive. That is reason to celebrate."

name: Torpor Dust
oracle_text:
Flash
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets -3/-0.
flavor_text: "Some folk these days are too restless to dream the dreams we need. We need to teach them to stop and catch their breath."

name: Torture
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
{1}{B}: Put a -1/-1 counter on enchanted creature.
flavor_text: What the vigor of life builds up, agony tears down again.

name: Traitor's Roar
oracle_text:
Tap target untapped creature. It deals damage equal to its power to its controller.
Conspire (As you cast this spell, you may tap two untapped creatures you control that share a color with it. When you do, copy it and you may choose a new target for the copy.)

name: Turn to Mist
oracle_text: Exile target creature. Return that card to the battlefield under its owner's control at the beginning of the next end step.
flavor_text:
"Did you expect me to dodge? How quaint."
—Olka, mistmeadow witch

name: Viridescent Wisps
oracle_text:
Target creature becomes green and gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
Draw a card.
flavor_text: In the wisps that night, the once timid boggart saw all the terrible, bloody things he was capable of. And it was glorious.

name: Wanderbrine Rootcutters
oracle_text: Wanderbrine Rootcutters can't be blocked by green creatures.
flavor_text: Most dirtwalkers only know of the vicious merrows that dwell in the shallows. They can't begin to fathom the wickedness that skulks in the Dark Meanders.

name: Watchwing Scarecrow
oracle_text:
Watchwing Scarecrow has vigilance as long as you control a white creature.
Watchwing Scarecrow has flying as long as you control a blue creature.
flavor_text: The wings are held in place by wicker rods. The rods are held in place by pure faith.

name: Whimwader
oracle_text: Whimwader can't attack unless defending player controls a blue permanent.
flavor_text:
"Thought? Deceit? Progress? Now you're just making it hungry."
—Abral, kithkin alchemist

name: Wildslayer Elves
oracle_text: Wither (This deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters.)
flavor_text: Some elves battled too long in the deep shadow, their swords dipped too often in tainted flesh and poisoned blood.

name: Wingrattle Scarecrow
oracle_text:
Wingrattle Scarecrow has flying as long as you control a blue creature.
Wingrattle Scarecrow has persist as long as you control a black creature. (When this creature dies, if it had no -1/-1 counters on it, return it to the battlefield under its owner's control with a -1/-1 counter on it.)

name: Woeleecher
oracle_text: {W}, {T}: Remove a -1/-1 counter from target creature. If you do, you gain 2 life.
flavor_text: One head senses the curse. The second loosens it from the soul. The third drinks it as an invigorating mist.

name: Zealous Guardian
oracle_text: Flash
flavor_text: Parapet watchers patrol the outer edges of the doun, signaling to others who wait patiently in shadow.
